DOC.brief_title: Outcomes Study Late Effects After Proton RT Pediatric Tumors Brain , Head , Neck
DOC.detailed_description: Data collection obtain patient 's medical record include initial evaluation , radiotherapy completion record follow-up .
DOC.criteria: Estimated > 5 cc brain tissue receive > 5 CGE radiation Patient must less 21 year age time consent . Patients require localized craniospinal irradiation . Patients and/or patient parent must complete baseline Quality Life Questionnaire applicable patient age group . Prior radiation therapy . Evidence metastasis outside central nervous system .
